page.title: 12CARE FOR THE ELDERLY
page.content: There are three types of care for the elderly in our area. Independant, Warden and Full-time care. Shuttleworth Court is an estate forindependant care. People there can do things for themselves such as cooking and cleaning. Grinter House is a mixture of flats and flatlets. People in the flats are still independant but they can buzz for a warden to come to give them help. The people in the flatlets have a daily helper as well as a warden. Beckside is a new Fully Dependant home for the elderly. Here the people are looked after by staff all of the time. They have their meals cooked for them and their rooms cleaned for them. This home is for old people who cannot look after themseleves. I think this home ia a great place. The residents are happy and the staff are kind.
